content: - the fuzzy bonnet is designed to be knitted from the top down in one continuous piece featuring a relaxed hood-like fit this pattern combines both knitting and crochet techniques along with an i-cord trim that offers a neat edge around the face - the bonnet is available in one size and can be made using any 8ply yarn of your choice i recommend selecting something fuzzy yet soft you will need 200g of yarn - alternatively you can hold two yarns together one 3ply and one 5ply or any combination that achieves the correct gauge 150-200g of each yarn - there is room for adjustments within the pattern to accommodate different preferences such as a customisable tie
